tool_description: The most precise and finely-tuned machine translation in the world
name: DpL Translator
title: DpL Translator

api_list.name: /translate
api_list.description: A list of acceptable languages can be found [here](https://rebrand.ly/DpL-Documentation).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dpl-translator.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dpl-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dpl-translator.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dpl-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
